commentThread.commentText: Feminist are attacking us media matters they ignored your sesta fosta clip. They are as much of pigs as fox news.

replies.commentText: OMG feminism is a shadow of it's former self...the only thing they might be attacking is your libido every time they say "no"! (again)

Feminism is not a monolithic organization with a clearly defined set of goals. Just because some feminists are shitty, that's not the same thing as feminism being shitty. Or are all right wing ideologues fascists because some of the right wing is fascist? Following your "argument" to it's natural conclusion would mean that every institution or ideology who has a couple of shitheads who don't really understand or believe in those things in good faith, those people are the representatives of the entire institution? Come on now. 

Just because some dumbass SWERFs left mean comments, that does not mean they speak for feminism, and especially not for feminists. Actually, pretty much every feminist you'll meet despises TERFs and SWERFs with about the same level of vitriol right wing whackos reserve for "SJWs", in my experience.
@west  Not my experience at all. Even in my industry many ashley/ gloria thumpers.

@west the term sex work is disingenuous for the amount of jobs it falls under. women in the category of it think they are less whorish than another. Because of all that we never will move forward. Along with that women wanting to dictate what others do an calling every one a victim.

@Leo's Universe "your experience" and the material realities of feminism are two different things. There's a reason anecdotal evidence is borderline useless in data: a single person's experiences may not reflect the broader trends and movements within, say, an institution. I'm sorry you had shitty experiences with people purporting to be feminists, but those shitty people are not representative of feminism itself, which has centuries of history, involves countless thousands of people, and has historically been much more beneficial to society than detrimental, especially for women (obviously). A couple of shitheads who posse as feminists saying mean things to you on the internet is really lame, but those few losers don't represent the movement towards gender parity, no matter how much they may claim to do so. "Even in my industry many Ashley\Gloria thumpers"? What is "your industry"? I'm sorry, but I have no idea what an "Ashley\Gloria thumper" is, unless you're referring to Ashley Crossman and Gloria Steinem? In which case I'd remind you that both of them took CIA money, some from the Dulles brothers, and some from COINTELPRO programs (although, so did Jackso n Pollock, Andy Warhol, and many other prominent artists, as well as film directors, musicians, architects, writers, and pretty much anybody in a creative field) and that Steinem herself is the one we have to thank for the Bernie Bro stereotype, once infamously stating that the only reason women volunteered for his campaign was to look cool "for their boyfriends". Does she sound very feminist to you? Look my dude, I understand the hell of being surrounded by lib "feminists" who basically just want more poc women dictators and CEOs, and give not a fuck at all about the actual, urgent necessity f or gender equality (which means making improvements in the material conditions of the lives of men, too) while they're simultaneously exuding embarrassing levels of smug self-righteousness. It's not fun. You're basically letting th ese lame-ass normie feminist try-hards poison the entire well of feminism for you, when in reality feminism is so much older, complex, beneficial, and non-elitist than they can possibly imagine. Think about it this way: if I worked with a couple of gamers, right, who are really obnoxious, elitist, and preachy about video games, and if I don't really know all that much about video games to begin with, I'd probably be pretty inclined to think that not only are ga mers lame, but video games as a cultural institution is full of self-righteous gamers who are exactly like the shitty gamers I do know. Do you see how you're kind of falling into this trap? Look man, I'm not really interesting in arguing with or shitting on other people on the internet anymore, so if your goal is to actually have a good-faith discussion about your perception of feminism, and are open to hearing perspectives that don't come exclusively from the center or right wing, I'm happy to talk this over with you. Unfortunately, many people, especially on YouTube comment threads, have no interest in this and just want to call the other person an "NPC" or talk about racial differences in IQ tests, because phrenology is making a comeback I guess.

@west excuse me dont call me man! I'm a women and I know. Its been decades these bitches have been coming at us, we are a large community of women in adult industry. They have been on the christian fundi kick long ass time too . I just went back an reread all their bs not a single opinion. The whole thing surrounding gloria from the beginning targeted us. I missed points because I have a different view about dominate men they pure shit, however, in that others like them in no way were we calling to ban an target women who want to submit to them. That included singling out conservative women who fetishise that crap. What they choose and who they are has no barring on me. But they come at us tooo they sing in unison with being anti sex anything. I have risked my life literally reporting stuff these bitch cunts allowed gov to attack me into my jobs an toss me on the street. I'm a gov kids I'm not a dumbass and they covered crimes for decades, im also a victim an witness to corruption yet they leak my info an no protections. Im not allowed to talk to gov enties or funded by on any of this. Youre a cluless twat~

@west Why dont you fucking explain mr gloria fucks misogynist comment that we voted for bernie to get fucking men????? Shes a sexist pig too she has die hards that follow her fem supremacist shit for days. Im fine with with the sup part not fine with coming at us... not every women is a dominate. Shes as clueless about sex, roles an all too. She should shut the fuck up now shes done a tank of damage. I been listening to this crap from every fucking women since I was born. Sellf loathers they wont leave us alone then vote for policies that have literally destroyed my life. Then say they are victims we are here to help??? by empowering my predators who are in gov. to come at me more fuck those bitches they dont listen to us unless you are a rich white women in thier upper crust circle. They say they are no t racist but who does it target? The most margilnized ppl including lgbtq which these feminist have thrown fitts over too. pure toxic cancer in this world. It wasnt for the reasons ppl like say breitbart thinks... deeper but truth is yes they are harming us. Terribly an their issues they have are self caused now. Teaching ppl to hate us.

@Leo's Universe I'm not sure I understand what you're trying to say. " Sex Work" actually refers to a pretty narrow set of economic occupations. If it involves sex, and there is money exchanged, it' s sex work. Besides, how many jobs a term covers is not a point against it's legitimacy at all in any way. Think of how many jobs fall under the category of "manual labor" for crying out loud! The whole point of having an umbrella term lik e "sex work" in the first place is precisely so many different jobs and professions can fit under that umbrella term ! What do you mean by "the women in the category of it think they are less whorish than another"? Because no matter their "degree" of " whorish"-ness, all of them are sex workers as long as their jobs inv olve sex or prov iding sexual services in some way. As for the hypothetical prospect o f some sex workers looking down o n other sex workers, this is an extremely flimsy and frankly total bullshit reason to not improve the live s of all sex workers. Have you considered that, perha ps if all sex workers were better take n care of, sex workers wouldn't be able to look down on each other as much as they do now? You're rejecting the solution by using the problem itself as the reason why, and honestly my dude it's not making any sense to me at all. Your statement of "Because of all that we will never move forward" is nonsense to me, sorry. I'm not saying you're stupid or even trying to insult you at all, but this argument is just stupid, my dude. We will never move forward because some minority of sex workers is going to be arrogant t owards other sex workers ? So it's not the structural impediments of the system itself, the ghosts of Christian religious morality baked into that system from it's inception, or the fanatic Christian fundamentalists who control (more than) half of our politicians (particularly the right wing ones) who have a very vested interest (from either owning shares of, or receiving campaign\Super PAC contributions from, private corrections industries, Bail bonds lobbies, and law enforcement groups\unions\lobbie s) in keeping sex work criminalized, and the punishments increasingly brutal and severe, the actual problem is just snide shade being thrown? Come on, that's ridiculous and we both know it. Trying to blame the horrific condi tions of labor sex workers fa ce every day on sex workers isn't just the weakest conservative argument I've heard on the issue, it's so unnecessarily cruel and dismissive I honestly don't know how you could be unashamed of such a brazen display of an utter lack of compassion, humility, and basic human decency towards one another. I really hope this isn't emblematic of the rest of your beliefs, because we are all only human, and we all deserve help and a better life no matter who we are. What were you talking about when you said "Along with women wanting to dictate what others do an [sic] calling everyone a victim"? Can you provide some examples, or data, or even just some context to this statement? Because without any of that, it just looks like the tired talking points that incel\mgtow\pua types fall back on after their arguments about how awful women are (mostly because they won't sleep with them, but also because they want equality and their internet friendos\daddies have been telling them how bad they and "SJWs" are for the last three years nonstop) get shown to be nonsense with no grounding in data, facts, or reality. Hopefully this is just stuff you've heard from bad actors taking advantage of your (probably entirely justified) feelings of alienation, disconnection, rejection, and loneliness, who have used them to try to weaponize you as their right wing (or anti-SJW, or anti-feminist, it's all the same by any other name) foot solider in the culture wars. In reality, they've taught you to cheer your own oppression by the status quo, even though it's the status quo itself which is responsible for the vast majority of your suffering. The only people actively trying to get past these failures of the status quo and free you from the ideological chains of your oppression, are the left wing, and feminists.
